TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit OracleBoolean extends System.ValueType implements class System.IComparable

Docs.summary: Represents the value returned from a database comparison operation between Oracle data types, and exposes methods used to perform data type conversions.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The key difference between an OracleBoolean structure and a standard **Boolean** value is that, where a standard `Boolean` has two possible values, `true` and `false`, an OracleBoolean structure has three possible values, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True>, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False>, or <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null>.
An OracleBoolean structure does not map to an Oracle `Boolean` data type; it is exposed as a convenience support class.

MemberSignature.Value: public OracleBoolean (bool value);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(bool value) cil managed

Docs.param: The `Boolean` to be used as the initial value of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> structure.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> structure using the specified `Boolean`.

MemberSignature.Value: public OracleBoolean (int value);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 value) cil managed

Docs.param: The `integer` to be used as the initial value of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> structure.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> structure using the specified integer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If is 0, the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> is `false`; otherwise it is `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean And (System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean x, System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean y);

.method public static hidebysig valuetype System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean And(valuetype System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean x, valuetype System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean y) cil managed

Docs.summary: Computes the bitwise AND of two specified <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> structures.
Docs.returns:
The result of the logical AND operation as shown in the following table.
|Value of|Value of|Result| |--------------|--------------|------------| |`true`|`true`|`true`| |`true`|`false`|`false`| |`false`|`false`|`false`| |`true`|`unknown`|`unknown`| |`false`|`unknown`|`false`| |`unknown`|`unknown`|`unknown`|

MemberSignature.Value: public int CompareTo (object obj);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 CompareTo(object obj) cil managed

Docs.param: An object to compare, or a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
Docs.summary: Compares this <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> structure to a specified object and returns an indication of their relative values.
Docs.returns:
A signed number indicating the relative values of the instance and value. |Value|Description| |-----------|-----------------| |A negative integer|This instance is less than .| |Zero|This instance is equal to .| |A positive integer|This instance is greater than .

-or-

is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).|

remarks.format: ## Remarks Any instance of <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean>, regardless of its value, is considered greater than a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).

Docs.returns: `true` if object is an instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> and the two are equal; otherwise `false`.

Docs.summary: Compares two <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> structures to determine if they are equal.
Docs.returns: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> that is <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> if the two instances are equal or <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> if the two instances are not equal. If either instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> is null, the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value%2A> of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> is <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null>.
